content:
Hey folks! We're planning to show off the new Inferno Framework, including introduction to writing tests, during a few demo sessions at the 2021 ONC Tech Forum!

Demo schedule (also on Google Doc):

Friday 9/10/2021 (WebEx Link)

  • 3:30 pm - 4:00 pm ET

Friday 9/17/2021 (WebEx Link)

  • 1:00 pm - 1:30 pm ET
  • 2:30 pm - 3:00 pm ET
  • 3:45 pm - 4:15 pm ET
Hi Johnny, is there a recording of friday's session?
Hey @Lee Surprenant yes there is! Recording is available via WebEx here (password: Ap93P3u2)

Reminder that we are having three Inferno Framework demo sessions today at the ONC Tech Forum!
Friday 9/17/2021 WebEx Link

  • 1:00 pm - 1:30 pm ET
  • 2:30 pm - 3:00 pm ET
  • 3:45 pm - 4:15 pm ET
